olm.general.molL_to_meqL¶

olm.general.molL_to_meqL(molL, ion)[source]¶

Calculates milliequivalents per liter from molar concentration.

Parameters:

molL : float or array

concentration in mol/L

ion : str

name of ion
Returns:

meqL : float or array

milliequivalents per liter
